symptoms.title: Chest Pain
symptoms.description: Severe chest pressure, pain radiating to arm/jaw

symptoms.title: Difficulty Breathing
symptoms.description: Shortness of breath, wheezing, gasping for air

symptoms.title: Sudden Weakness
symptoms.description: Sudden numbness, face drooping, speech difficulty (stroke signs)

symptoms.title: Severe Burns
symptoms.description: Large area burns, electrical or chemical burns

instructions: Call emergency services immediately if someone is in immediate danger
Do not move injured persons unless they are in further danger
Stay calm and provide clear information to dispatchers
If trained, provide first aid while waiting for help
Keep a list of current medications and allergies ready to share
